attributes.action: reduce the notice that a soldier has to give before he/she is allowed to leave
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: soldiers at the moment have to give 12 months notice after serving a mandatory term. i/we respectfully request that you reduce this to 1 calender month as it is an aged system. almost everywhere else in europe you only have to give the same notice as you are paid i.e paid montly give a months notice. in the army we are not on a salary and are paid monthly. once a soldier signs off his mind is no longer on his job and is on working his future out.
